title: 3.3 Master Challenge 1
question: Create an animation in which an animal is the character. When the animal is tapped, it should grow and say I am growing. After sometime it should shrinkand say I am shrinking. Use a recorded sound.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
